meanings.definition: Act of hosting an event or performance
meanings.sent1: The emceeing at the talent show was done by a friendly host.
meanings.sent2: The emceeing of the award ceremony was flawless and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The emceeing of the school play made the audience feel welcomed and excited.
meanings.sent4: Her emceeing of the charity event was like guiding a ship through calm waters.
meanings.sent5: The emceeing of the concert was so lively that everyone felt included and entertained.

meanings.definition: Serving as a master of ceremonies
meanings.sent1: The emceeing individual kept the event running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her emceeing skills at various events.
meanings.sent3: The emceeing gentleman had a knack for making people smile.
meanings.sent4: His emceeing presence was like a warm blanket on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The emceeing host's charisma shone through in every introduction.

meanings.definition: Presenting or introducing performers or speakers
meanings.sent1: She will be emceeing the concert next Friday.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys emceeing events and making people feel welcome.
meanings.sent3: Emceeing the comedy show, she added a touch of humor to the introductions.
meanings.sent4: The emceeing of the conference was like orchestrating a symphony of speakers.
meanings.sent5: He emceeing the event with such grace that the audience was captivated from the start.
